Articles.Content: Upon separation from a docking port (the creation of 2 craft from one in flight) the new craft does not initialize the antenna comnet state correctly.  If an antenna is retracted and redeployed, comnet connection is established.  I believe the initialization of the new ship when created in space is not checking to see if an antenna is present and deployed.  It seems the default state is always no comnet connection until acted upon.
